thread.title: Chalets d’ Anse Forbans of the Seychelles celebrates anniversary
thread.title_full: Chalets d’ Anse Forbans of the Seychelles celebrates anniversary

author: Assignment Editor
title: Chalets d’ Anse Forbans of the Seychelles celebrates anniversary
text:
Chalets d’ Anse Forbans of the Seychelles celebrates anniversary   
Oct 16, 2015 eTN   
The Seychellois owned and family run Seychelles Self Catering Beach Chalets located on Mahe Island will celebrate 21 years of operation on the 20th October 2015. 
The Chalets opened their doors on the 20th October 1994 and since this humble date of operation has seen great success both with further expansion as well as higher occupancy levels. They are pioneers in their field and have weathered global recessions throughout the past 21 years. 
Chalets d’ Anse Forbans are not only active in the tourism field but they are known as leaders in the fight for conservation in the Seychelles. They support their local community and local businesses.
